class.name: com.cardiodx.db.waban.table.EventSubscription
class.comment: Table used to link event handlers to an event

column.name: EVENT_HANDLER_ID
column.comment: Foreign key to the event handler that will be executed when the event is processed

column.name: STUDY_PROTOCOL_ID
column.comment: Optional foreign key for validation event handlers that are specific to each study protocol

column.name: EVENT_ID
column.comment: Foreign key to the event that is being subscribed

column.name: WARNING
column.comment: Indicator field if set to 1 will treat return message as a warning. Otherwise return message will be treated as an error.

column.name: LOCKED
column.comment: Indicator field used to lock a subscribed event that can only be changed by the DBA or Administrator use.

column.name: PRIORITY
column.comment: Field used to order the event handlers to be processed in a certain order

column.name: CREATED_BY
column.comment: User that has subscribed to the event

column.name: DATE_CREATED
column.comment: Date when record has been created
